cause.description:
this is a no kill shelter run on donations and volunteers. No cats are refused they even have a ward for hiv cats to live out their lives as happy as can be. Thank you Dr. Bhullar for all your help and thank you penny for being such a saint.
http://www.forgottenfelines.ca/
1. I love all cats and think it's terrible to euthanize them just for being homeless
cause.mission: find homes for cats people have forgotten
cause.name: forgotten felines
